actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

actions.subcommittee: Government Efficiency, Financial Management and Intergovernmental Relations
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Efficiency, Financial Management and Intergovernmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Efficiency, Financial Management and Intergovernmental Relations

official_title: To require executive agencies to establish expedited review procedures for granting a waiver to a State under a grant program administered by the agency if another State has already been granted a similar waiver by the agency under such program.

summary.text: Directs the head of each executive agency to establish expedited review procedures under which a State may be granted a waiver under an agency grant program if another State has already been granted a similar waiver.

titles.title: To require executive agencies to establish expedited review procedures for granting a waiver to a State under a grant program administered by the agency if another State has already been granted a similar waiver by the agency under such program.
